# PED::SET_PED_CAN_LOSE_PROPS_ON_DAMAGE

## Summary
Can be used to stop the ped from losing his (glasses/hats) or helmet when receiving damage

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** value
* **PROP_DAMAGE_FLAGS** flag = 0
